coded_answer.p: I am writing, on behalf of the students in my class, to thank you very much for the trip to London. Besides , we would like to go to the London Fashion Andand Leisure Show, which was advertised in the newspaper "Metro""Metro" newspaper yesterday.

This show takes place at the Central Exhibition Hall in London on Tuesday 14th March from 10:00 to 19:00 o'clock. All my classmates are very interested in this show, which includes the latest fashions, Leisureleisure and sports wear, Make upmake-up, and Hairhair styles. Moreover, one of the important thingthings for us is that entrance fee is free for students, because students are generally short of money.
We would like to suggest you change the shopping datetrip to Wednesday afternoon, because we have some free time on Wednesday afternoon.
We would be very pleased if you couldwould consider our recommendation.
Everyone deservedeserves a private life. However, most famous people, for example football playerplayers and film stars, have not got anya privetprivate life.
They feel exhausted to bebeing followed by journalists .
Even theyThey even have an arguearguments with journalists as they sometimes write unrealinaccurate newsreports.
On the other hand, some people need journalists to bebecome more famous, because people can haveget newspublicity who are famouswho are famous can get publicity through journalists.
As a resultIn conclusion, journalists should respect their lifelives and always write realaccurate newsreports.
